# componentInfoCbCr

**Instance Property**

A [doc://com.apple.corevideo/documentation/CoreVideo/CVPlanarComponentInfo] structure containing information on the Cb/Cr component of the buffer.

## Declaration

```swift
var componentInfoCbCr: CVPlanarComponentInfo
```

## Properties

- **componentInfoY**: A [doc://com.apple.corevideo/documentation/CoreVideo/CVPlanarComponentInfo] structure containing information on the Y component of the buffer.
